mapper.select: select depart.dp_code, depart.depart_name as depart_name, count(*) as count from users, depart where users.dp_code = depart.dp_code AND users.stat is not null group by users.dp_code having users.dp_code = #{dp_code}
mapper.update: update depart set count = count + 1 where dp_code= #{dp_code}
